sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import Additem from './AddItem' class ItemDetail extends Component { constructor(props) { super (props); this.state = { 'edit' : true } this.Edit = this.Edit.bind(this) } Edit() { var x = this.state.edit console.log(x) } render() { var { task, index } = this.props return ( {index + 1} {task.name} {task.level === 'high' ? 'High' : task.level === 'low' ? 'Low' : 'Medium'} ) return ( ) } } export default ItemDetail
